inclusion.criterion: percutaneous coronary intervention (PCI) with IVUS and OCT guidance
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: coronary plaques ≧ 500 µm in thickness or % plaque of 20% or more at ≧ 5 mm distal or proximal to the previously treated area
inclusion.label: unknown
met
inclusion.evidence: lab study: Cholesterol: 190 mg/dl, LDL: 125 mg/dl

inclusion.criterion: cholesterol-lowering treatment allowed when LDL-C ≧ 100 mg/dL or TC ≧ 180mg/dL
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: written consent by patient or legal representative
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: bypass graft or in-stent restenosis at the site of PCI
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: PCI in the past on the lesion where evaluation is planned
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: plaques in a non-culprit site and might receive PCI during treatment period
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: lipid-lowering drugs (fibrates, probucol, nicotinic acid, cholestyramine or cholesterol absorption inhibitors)
exclusion.label: unknown
not_met
exclusion.evidence: family history: DM type 1 in uncle and grandfather

notes: Patient has type 1 diabetes, cardiomyopathy, and is taking ACE inhibitors and Beta blockers. He also takes insulin and vitamin D supplements.
